column4: hi. I saw that on karmic amd64, flash is used using nspluginwrapper? why that? is there a reason the native version isn't used?
#ubuntu+1
ah, ok :)
the native version isnt released as final, i think
yeah, but karmic uses a lot of alpha sw ;)
adobe only allows the final versions in the partner repo
adobe wont allow it
huh?
adobe will not allow non-final versions of flash in the repository
that is their contract
not even in the alpha repository?
no because then people would expect it to be in the released version of karmic
youtube has an html5 version available..
that unfortunately doesn't work with ff3.5 as it doesn't use theora :(
is there any way to get flash working with pulseaudio?
it should work automatically...
sure doesn't. it tries to use alsa, fails, uses /dev/dsp and blocks everything
which version of ubuntu? it should have routed to pulseaudio instead of dsp when it tried to use alsa directly...
karmic alpha 4
hmm dunno. but that's a #ubuntu+1 question. im running karmic too, but im using open source flash
